title: [Vornavis, Outlands Road]
description: Dark patches glide silently across the moonlit grasses, invisibly tied to the wind-driven clouds above.  The whisper of each blade of grass brushing gently against its neighbor combines to form a constant, unending hiss that rises and falls with the wind.

Dark patches glide silently across the nodding grasses, invisibly tied to the wind-driven clouds above.  The whisper of each blade of grass brushing gently against its neighbor combines to form a constant, unending hiss that rises and falls with the wind.
